resources.string: All burger patties should be made up of ground beef - 80% lean and 20% fat. Season the patties only with salt and bp while on the oven

Sauce Ingredients:
 3 tbsp. mayonnaise 3 tbsp. shallots, finely diced
 3 tbsp. dill pickles, finely diced 
 3 tbsp. tomato ketchup 
 1 tbsp. Dijon mustard 
 1/2 tsp. onion powder
 1/2 tsp. garlic powder
 1/2 tsp. sweet paprika 
 1 tsp. white wine vinegar
